description: Web Marketing and Design - marketing website built with Framheim.
author: Remy Schrader <remy@rootandflow.com> (http://www.rootandflow.com)

scripts.vendor: shx cp -R node_modules/foundation-sites/scss/* _sass && shx mv _sass/foundation.scss _sass/_foundation.scss && shx cp node_modules/foundation-sites/dist/foundation.min.js js && shx cp node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js js && shx cp node_modules/webfontloader/webfontloader.js js
